alert.note: Alert for Golden Valley; Judith Gap; Musselshell; Southern Wheatland (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 10 at 8:44PM MST until January 11 at 3:00PM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch. * WHERE...Golden Valley, Judith Gap, Musselshell, and Southern Wheatland. * WHEN...Until 3 PM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick. The slick conditions could impact the Thursday morning commute. Strong wind gusts could cause blowing snow through Judith Gap, reducing visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Falling temperatures will combine with winds to produce wind chills of 10 below zero to 20 below zero tonight and Thursday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Golden Valley; Judith Gap; Musselshell; Southern Wheatland
